REMINDER: Register Now and Save your Seat! 2012 Spring User Group Meetings
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
This is our 5th year under the TriTech umbrella, and our top priority continues to be customer service and satisfaction! Please mark your calendars for one of the 2012 Spring User Group Meetings near you. We look forward to face-to-face discussions about how we can help meet your agency's needs.
This is your opportunity to learn about:
- New features available within Build 19 - Product roadmap for Build 20 >Including the Google Mapping Integration - National Support Center and customer service initiatives
Your attendance at a User Group Meeting is important, not only for receiving updates on the software, services and company direction, but also to continually help our team better understand your business needs.
(Please note that the New Bedford, MA and Dennis, MA dates have changed from the original invite:)
DATES AND LOCATIONS: April 24: New Bedford, MA April 25: Dennis, MA April 26: Norwood, MA April 30: Grafton, MA May 1: Agawam, MA May 2: Warwick, RI May 3: New Haven, CT May 7: Portsmouth, NH May 8: North Haverhill, NH May 10: Augusta, ME June 6: Trenton, NJ
REGISTER NOW http://offers.tritech.com/UserGroups_2012_Register.html
We hope to see you soon,
Phil Sisk, Vice President of Operations Leo Hisoire, Senior Product Manager TriTech Software Systems | North Grafton, MA
